title: Wait lord Dominique is op early game
body: I just found out they didn't change lord Dominique or the other one and I went full tank and got destroyed at 12 minutes.... Why didn't they change the armour pen  on it?

+30 armour
--> *Unique Passive: Blocks 12% of the damage from basic attacks*
Unique Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

They reworked this item, it really helps if the enemy ad gets fed. I can understand that losing the tenacity from merc treads as a tank can be hard but this is the better option if you're being shredded by a fed adc who got a lord dominicks as their 2nd or 3rd item. 

Also randuins helps alot against adcs since it lowers atk speed, offers a chunk of hp and armour, has a slow, and it reduces the damage you take from crits. But the coldsteel passive only applies for you, so if you want to help your team more, go the frozen heart, or even buy both.

still leaves the question why wasnt it changed if it does just as much if not more than normal armor pen, and if so adc champs can build this mid game to destroy tanks

lord dominicks is the adc's solution to tanks and for tanks you have thornmail, ninjatabi (12% damage reduction from autos since the rework, it's actually a good buy), randuins and stacking hp. If you're having an issue with adcs who build lord dominicks you either need to consider building some more hp, thornmail so they suffer as well, or an item with coldsteel to reduce their attack speed.

They nerfed flat armour pen since it was unhealthy on assassins since it was exceptionally good earlygame and for killing squishies and not very useful for killing tanks. Hence why lethality is now basically scaling armour pen.

% armour pen is very useful for killing tanks but won't do much against a squishy. Lord Dominicks isn't all that useful against a target with similar hp and already almost no armour. Against squishies you'd get more out of just building another ad or atkspeed item compared to the armour pen.
